Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I am also an avid gamer; my current obsession is with Baldur's Gate 3. On a similar note, I also really enjoy table-top RPGs and am currently between campaigns, so if you're a DM with an open seat, my DMs are likewise open!

I do also touch grass from time to time, or at least my running shoes do. I play a few different instruments, namely the piano, drums and a little guitar; I also lightly dabble in music production.
